entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Grande Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grande Prairie Airport 1:52 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.0 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4
